recreation.name: Oba Palace
recreation.description: The Ancient abode of the Benin Monarch

recreation.name: Emotan Statue
recreation.description: A patriotic heroine who helped Oba Ewuare I to ascend the throne
recreation.address: Opposite Oba Market, By Ibiwe Junction, Benin City

recreation.name: Asoro Statue
recreation.description: Hero of the British - Benin War of 1897. He held and defended the Sokpomba axis of Benin City
recreation.address: Sokpomba Road Junction, Ring Road, Benin City

recreation.name: Statue of Kings in King Square
recreation.description: Monuments commemorating the 30th anniversary of Oba Erediawa as King of Benin
